C.notes: Log scale. Smaller C = stronger regularization. Typical: 0.01-1.0.

penalty.notes: l1: sparse weights (feature selection); l2: shrinks weights (default)

solver.notes: liblinear: good for small datasets; saga: fast for large datasets, supports l1

max_iter.description: Maximum number of iterations for solver convergence
max_iter.notes: Increase if solver doesn't converge. Typical: 1000-1500.

num_pca_components.description: Number of PCA components for dimensionality reduction
num_pca_components.notes: Range is dataset-specific. Set in default_config.yaml or auto-detected.
